name: The Last Planet
description:
A giant black hole appeared near our solar system and all the planets are swallowed except the Earth.

10 years ago, experts in the outer space have already predicted that a giant black hole will appear. The best solution they have is to make the earth like a big spaceship where it can be controlled by humans to avoid being swallowed and avoid incoming asteroids.

They also made a super advance technology to make the size of the earth to mini size to avoid more asteroids.

You are now the pilot of the Earth and you have to do everything to save our planet, the last planet in the solar system.
